attributes.action: We request more information that has not been announced in regards to the GDPR!
attributes.background:
We request more information from the UK government in regards to the GDPR. The information we request (that has not yet been published is listed below)

We request that the government set the "digital age of consent", and announce this before the GDPR comes into effect (25 May 2018).

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
